entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 09:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
